data_feed_details.optimized_for_gas_cost: Optimized for gas cost and decentralization
data_feed_details.integration_details_description: Witnet price feeds can be integrated into your own {0} contracts in two different ways:
data_feed_details.feed_description: This is a Witnet powered {name} data feed available on {network}. Last reported value is {value} (updated on {date}). This price feed is updated every {heartbeat}, or every time the price changes by more than {deviation}.

transactions_list.witnet_explorer: Tx en el explorador de Witnet

chart.heartbeat_text: El feed se actualiza antes de que el tiempo de heartbeat acabe
chart.deviation_text: Cuando el precio varía más que el porcentaje de desviación, se envía una data request a la red de Witnet para actualizar el feed con un nuevo valor
